Talk_0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>The Tarrey Town Race project is an
important part of the effort to develop
new vehicles.
And it's almost ready. I just need to wrap
up some final details.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I will need a bit of time to prepare, but it
shouldn't take long.

While you wait, why not get a bit of rest
at a stable?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>You can put that free sleepover ticket
to good use.
Talk_0071:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Congratulations!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>I can't believe you cleared the expert
course. <sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:0:0>I should have expected as much
from a voe Tali respects!
Here, please, I want you to have this
memento for beating the expert course
for the first time!
Talk_0120:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I apologize if I talked you into doing
something you weren't up for.<sp:5:0:0> Here,
let me return your entry fee.
Talk_0097:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh, uh... I had <clr:0000>three Zonai charges <clr:ffff>to
give you, but you don't seem to have
room to carry them.
Talk_0072:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room to
carry it, do you?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went to the trouble of
preparing a <clr:0000>large Zonai charge<clr:ffff> for you,
you have no choice but to accept it!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for it among your things.
Talk_0098:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>and I'll give you your prize later
as well, after you've made some room
in your pouch.
Talk_0121:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks for coming!<sp:5:0:0>


You know, I was just, uh, thinking how
useful it would be to have some, uh,
clothes-free driving data. Yeah, I was.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:1:0>No, I wasn't...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I'm looking forward to watching you take
on the expert course next!
Talk_0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you <clr:0000>touch all the lights<clr:ffff> and get back
here within the time limit, you win.

But <clr:0000>take your hands off<clr:ffff> the steering stick
once you've grabbed it or <clr:0000>go too far off
course<clr:ffff>, and I have to disqualify you.
The rules are in the book on the desk if
you care to check it out later.
Talk_0075:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Fantastic. Those are the words I wanted
to hear. Which course do you want to try?
Talk_0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Which course do you want to see? The
beginner course or the expert course?
Talk_0124:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>So you know, you pay the <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupee<clr:ffff>
entry fee in advance. If you're going
to give it a go, I can take that now.
Talk_0077:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>So, my record stands without challenge.
Unfortunate.
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:CallFar_00>So, uh...are you going somewhere?
If so, I'll turn off the course lights.
Talk_0125:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went to the trouble of
preparing <clr:0000>five Zonai charges<clr:ffff> for you,
you have no choice but to accept them!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for them among your things.
Talk_0078:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>I can't believe it! <sp:5:0:0>You actually broke
Tali's record!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Here, this is my way of thanking you for
helping us collect so much valuable
race data...
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah, you made some room!<sp:5:0:0> Well, again...


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I want to thank you for helping me gather
so much excellent data.<sp:5:0:0> I'm very grateful.
Now please, here's your reward...
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>Of course. Just give me a moment to
get it ready.
Talk_0126:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went and prepared <clr:0000>three
big wheel Zonai capsules <clr:ffff>for you, you
have no choice but to accept them!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for them among your things.
Talk_0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Eh...<sp:5:0:0> With the steering stick in that
position, it's going to be difficult to
get a good, solid grip.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll have to make it safe to drive or
I won't be able to capture the data
I need.
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Let me know when you're done giving
it a thorough look.
Talk_0127:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went and prepared <clr:0000>three
fan Zonai capsules <clr:ffff>for you, you have no
choice but to accept them!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for them among your things.
Talk_0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>I better see you back here when the
Tarrey Town Race gets up and running.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>You're dying for a chance to beat Tali's
record, aren't ya? I can see it all over
your face.
Talk_0103: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>In that case, I'll turn off the course lights.
Talk_0128:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went and prepared <clr:0000>three
small wheel Zonai capsules <clr:ffff>for you, you
have no choice but to accept them!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for them among your things.
Talk_0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Let's see... <sp:5:0:0>I just have to flip this switch
again...and that one...
Talk_0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Let's see... The switch for the beginner
course is...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0129:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I see...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have room, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, since I went and prepared <clr:0000>three
rocket Zonai capsules <clr:ffff>for you, you have
no choice but to accept them!<sp:0:4:0>Just come back after you've made some
room for them among your things.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Having someone like you to compete with
will help keep Tali sharp.

And a piece of advice... Don't go thinking
you'll be able to beat her record so easily.
Talk_0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Who'd have thought a voe could race like
that?!<sp:5:0:0> All right, I'll say it... That was some
brilliant driving!
Talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseS_01>If you go upstairs, you can see out over
the entire course.
Talk_0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy_00>Well, well, well! How about that?<sp:5:0:0> It's not
often Tali has so much to say.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Seems like her next great rivalry has
begun. I'm honored to witness
the beginning!
Talk_0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CallFar_00>Now I'm going to explain the rules, just
to make sure they've sunk in.<sp:0:4:0>The time limit for the beginner course
is <clr:0000>2 minutes<clr:ffff> exactly.

You want to touch <clr:0000>all the lights<clr:ffff> and get
back here within that time, OK?

If you <clr:0000>take your hands off<clr:ffff> the steering
stick once you've grabbed it or <clr:0000>go too
far off course<clr:ffff>, you're disqualified.
Understand?<sp:5:0:0> Good. <sp:5:0:0>Now, on your marks...
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>So how about it? Want to see if you can
beat Tali's record?
Talk_0108:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Ah well.<sp:5:0:0> You weren't able to break the
record this time...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But WOW, watching you weave all over
the course was very exciting!
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Your mastery of the steering stick was
impressive. Well done.
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CallFar_01>Let me explain the rules again.<sp:0:4:0>Tali's record is <clr:0000>2 minutes<clr:ffff> exactly. You
must touch<clr:0000> all of the lights<clr:ffff> and return to
the starting point in that time.
Don't <clr:0000>take your hands off<clr:ffff> the steering
stick once you've grabbed it or <clr:0000>go too
far off course<clr:ffff>.
Now, <sp:5:0:0>on your mark...
Talk_0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>What happened? Did you have some kind
of vehicle trouble?
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:CustomSavsaaba_00>Sav'saaba. You here to check out the
course's lights?
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:CustomSavotta_00>Sav'otta. You here to do some driving this
morning?
0010: I want to talk to you...
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Where are you taking that?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201><sp:0:2:2:6400>That steering stick is to be used for the
Tarrey Town Race. Please do not take it
without permission.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:CustomSavotta_00>Sav'otta. I'm so sleepy this morning. It's
hard to wake up.
Near_0001: Tarrey Town Race is a go!
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>My record is <clr:0000>2 minutes<clr:ffff> exactly.
I'm confident it won't take you long
to beat that.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:TalkPositive_01>I guess you can't lose if you don't try,
eh?<sp:5:0:0> I hadn't figured you for the sort to
back down.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Color me disappointed.
Near_0003: Can't wait to see you race!
0016: I'd like to see the course.
Talk_0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>After seeing how you optimized your
racing line, I feel like you're ready for
something a bit more challenging.
You and I should talk. Come see me
later, will you?
Talk_0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you've made some room
in your pouch.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I have a <clr:0000>large Zonai charge <clr:ffff>waiting
for you!
Talk_0131:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you have enough room
to carry things.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I have <clr:0000>three big wheel Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>
waiting for you!
Talk_0083: <sp:3:0:2:0801>All right, let's get started right away!
Talk_0132:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you have enough room
to carry things.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I have <clr:0000>three fan Zonai capsules <clr:ffff>waiting
for you!
Talk_0133:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you have enough room
to carry things.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I have <clr:0000>three small wheel Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>
waiting for you!
Talk_0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CallFar_00>Let me just go over the rules.<sp:0:4:0>The time to beat on the expert course
is <clr:0000>3 minutes<clr:ffff>.

If you <clr:0000>touch each and every light <clr:ffff>and get
back here before the timer runs out,
you win!
But <clr:0000>don't let go <clr:ffff>of the steering stick once
you've grabbed it, and <clr:0000>don't go too far off
course<clr:ffff>. Now, <sp:5:0:0>on your marks...
Talk_0061:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Come by again after you've made some
room to carry things. I have <clr:0000>three Zonai
charges <clr:ffff>waiting for you!
Talk_0134:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you have enough room
to carry things.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I have <clr:0000>three rocket Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>
waiting for you!
Talk_0062:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Come back when you have enough room
to carry things.

I have <clr:0000>five Zonai charges <clr:ffff>waiting for you!
Talk_0110:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>One thing I know for sure, the data we
collect here will be essential to future
Zonai-device development!
And while it won't be easy, I'm certain we
can make the Tarrey Town Race into
something truly outstanding.
Talk_0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Please, come back and drive it
again sometime.
Talk_0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Watching you drive was...enlightening.
I realized many important things. Sarqso.
Talk_0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I am so grateful you found the
steering stick.

Now I can get to work on the project I'm
most excited about—the <clr:0000>Tarrey Town
Race<clr:ffff>. Thank you, really!
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks for coming!


To tell the truth, I had a feeling you'd
turn up today.
Talk_0136:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's what I like to hear!<sp:5:0:0> You want to
use your vehicle as is, or would you like
to make some adjustments?
Talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks for coming! You know, normally
it'd be my break time right now.

But I had a feeling you'd make an
appearance and decided to wait around!
Talk_0137:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's what I like to hear!<sp:5:0:0> You want to
use that vehicle of yours as is, or would
you like to make some adjustments?
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>Since you'll be helping us collect data,<sp:5:0:0>
any Zonai device or building material you
find around here is yours to use.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Just let me know when everything
is ready.
Talk_0113:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks for coming! I was thinking about
heading to bed...

But the weirdest thing is, I had a feeling
you'd come by, so I waited up!
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry><sp:0:2:2:7d00>I said you can't take that!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>That steering stick is to be used in the
Tarrey Town Race! How many times must
I tell you?!
Talk_0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks for coming!


Wow, I was just wishing I had some
rainy-weather race data...and then
you showed up!
Talk_0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Ah no! <sp:5:0:0>It seems you don't have enough
rupees. <sp:5:0:0>Secure <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff>, and then let's
have you challenge the course.
Talk_0042: <sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Happy_01>Are you going to challenge Tali's record?
Talk_0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm happy to explain as many times as you
need, so ask away!
Talk_0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Let's see... The switch for the expert
course is...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks for coming. <sp:5:0:0>The thing I wanted to
talk to you about is... Well, you see...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Operating expenses for this Tarrey Town
Race are a bit tight...

So,<sp:5:0:0> ah...<sp:5:0:0>what I'm trying to say is...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>We're now going to charge an entry fee
of <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff> per run!<sp:5:0:0> Exciting news,
isn't it?! Thrilling even!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Yes? <sp:5:1:0>No?<sp:5:0:0> Sorry. Perhaps "exciting" is
the wrong word.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>It is a difficult announcement to make.
And I can see that giving it a cheery spin
did not help.
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>But still, <sp:5:0:0>we have the <clr:0000>expert course<clr:ffff>,
which I believe is worth trying even if
you do have to pay a fee.
And of course I'll reward you if we're
able to get good data.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>So I'm confident the experience will be
well worth the <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>I'm sure you have prep work to do now,
so please pay right before you start.
Talk_0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>That was some admirable driving.<sp:5:0:0>
Not only that, you set a new record!<sp:5:0:0>
Congratulations!
I have to thank you for helping me gather
such high-quality driving data. Here...
Talk_0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm collecting <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff> as an entry
fee. What do you say—you want to give
it a try?
Talk_0117:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Isn't that the course that's already lit up?
Maybe you forgot?
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>With a record like that... Well, I'm sure
you'll beat it right away.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>What?! But I really wanted to see
you drive.
Talk_0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>I don't want you to waste that <clr:0000><sp:2:f:38:320043006900720063007500690074005f0049006300680069006b006100720061005f0050006100790052007500700065006500ffff00cd> rupee<clr:ffff>
entry fee.

So if there's anything you don't get,
now's your chance to clear it up.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I got a good look at your driving skills
with these eyes of mine, voe!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Mark my words, when the preparations for
the Tarrey Town Race are complete, you'll
be back.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Why, you ask?<sp:5:1:0> Bah!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>You have the heart of a racer, that's why!
You can't resist the pull of the driver's
seat for long.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Chat_00>Please let me know if you need
anything else.
Talk_0119:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice>What are you going to do now?<sp:5:0:0> Feel like
giving it another go?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:CustomSavaaq_00>Sav'aaq. I'm pleased to see you're looking
well today.
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Let's see... <sp:5:0:0>First I'll activate the switch for
the course...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble_00>There's more to it than I thought.


It's not just about the driving technique.
It is about how the driver makes use of 
the vehicle's unique capabilities.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>As I watched you run the course from the
sidelines, your approach enlightened me.
You have my thanks. Sarqso.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>Once you've readied the vehicle you plan
to use in the race, go ahead and attach
the <clr:0000>steering stick <clr:ffff>we prepared.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Well, if you change your mind, you're
welcome to try for the record anytime.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>With Tali as our test driver, we spent a lot
of time tinkering with the course design...

And we arrived at this masterpiece!
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Drivers have to use the <clr:0000>steering stick
we provide<clr:ffff>. It's the only way I can collect
the data I need.
As far as the vehicle itself—anything goes!
Use whatever you like.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Now, if you're up for it, I'd love to see you
do some driving.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>You're the traveler from before!<sp:5:0:0> I knew
you couldn't stay away.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>The steering stick is all set up,<sp:5:1:0> so we're
good to begin.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Watching you drive the course was
very informative. I'm grateful.

Sarqso.
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wooo-hooo!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I apologize. I got excited, and I can't help
but woo and hoo when I get excited.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>With the help of Hudson Construction, we
built a course for test-driving vehicles.

These runs will help us better research
the steering stick's capabilities.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>So, welcome to the Tarrey Town Race!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Sounds fun, doesn't it?


If I recall correctly, Tali's best time is <clr:0000>two
minutes<clr:ffff> exactly.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Tali's fastest time is <clr:0000>2 minutes<clr:ffff> exactly.
So that's the time you need to beat.

Touch <clr:0000>all the lights<clr:ffff> and then get back
here faster than that, and you win.

But you can't <clr:0000>take your hands off<clr:ffff>
the steering stick or <clr:0000>go too far off
course<clr:ffff>, OK?
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>So how about it?<sp:5:0:0> You want to make a run
